sentences.sentence: In this review, the distribution and physiologic functions of endogenous opioid peptides in hypothalamus were discussed.
sentences.translation: 本文主要对内阿片肽在下丘脑中的分布特点及生理功能作了介绍。

sentences.sentence: The research team discovered changes in mu opioid receptors and dopamine transporters of the brain -- areas important to reward pathways.
sentences.translation: 研究团队发现在的末梢神经及大脑的多巴胺传输中，区域对酬谢路径非常重要。

sentences.sentence: It appears to involve more primitive aspects of the brain, activating deep structures that may block pain at a spinal level — similar to how opioid analgesics work.
sentences.translation: 这似乎涉及到大脑更原始的问题，激活深层结构可能会阻止在脊椎级的疼痛-与阿司匹林片类镇痛药的作用相似。
